articles.author: Ben Husband
articles.title: Man Utd rocked by fresh injury blow with Erik ten Hag signing ruled out for season - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United have confirmed that Marcel Sabizter will miss the rest of the season, with a knee injury set to keep him on the sidelines until after next month's FA Cup final
articles.content:
Manchester United have confirmed Marcel Sabizters season is over after suffering a knee injury.
Signed on loan from Bayern Munich during the January window, the Austrian has impressed in the centre … [+3632 chars]
